content.sliceAuthorization1: We use Slice.fi, which is a digital student card and student benefit service. By answering yes, you give us permission to provide the service with the following information: name, email address, date of birth, and the end date of your study right or studies.

content.whatsAppIntegration: You can turn the WhatsApp integration on by clicking the icon. Please note that the integration will work only if you have entered your phone number with the country code, e.g. +358 40 123 4567. When the integration is active, you will see a WhatsApp button in your contact information. Clicking the button will open the WhatsApp Web client.

content.addTaskInstruction:
Clicking on the plus icon will open the editor where you are able to give a new task to a student. You may schedule the task to start and/or finish at a specified time by setting the start date and/or finish date for the task. You may also leave the date fields empty. The dates will have no impact on the visibility of the task.

The student will see the task you have given them on the state of studies tab in the Studies view. Once the student has marked the task as done, its status changes to Waiting for approval. You can then approve or reject the task. Finally, you will have to archive the task (by clicking the Trashcan icon).

content.completionEstimateYears1: I estimate I will graduate Lukio in
content.finnishMandatority: In mother tongue and literature you can choose Finnish as a second language, if your mother tongue is other than Finnish. In mother tongue and literature I will study
content.hopsChangeable: HOPS can be edited. You can update your choices as you progress.
content.hopsIntro:
This form will help you to make a study plan (HOPS). Answer the questions based on your current thoughts, you can edit your plan later. HOPS is primarily a contract with yourself: What, how and when will you study. If you fill the form individually, pay close attention to the instructions provided.

Return the HOPS to your counselor by saving it with the Save-button at the bottom of the page.

You have 4 years for your lukio-studies at most. You can graduate in about 2-4 years based on how long your study rights and time usage are. The previous lukio-studies lessen the study right you are permitted.

At least 2,5 year vocational basic qualification (120 study weeks / 180 study points) will directly grant you right for matriculation examination. Having 2 year vocational qualification will need you to pass at least 2 mandatory lukio-courses in subjects you wish to matriculate in.

content.matriculationPlanGuides1: Finnish or Finnish as a second language + 4 other subjects that are selected from three different subject groups.
content.matriculationPlanGuides2: Note. One advanced exam is mandatory (A-level foreign language or advanced mathematics).
content.matriculationPlanGuides3: Try ILMO-tool, to see what kind of combinations you can accomplish matriculation examination.
content.matriculationPlanTarget: I plan to participate in the matriculation examinations.

content.matriculationEligibilityGuides1: To be eligible for the matriculation registration, you must complete enough studies in the subjects you wish to participate in the matriculation examination. Note. If you have vocational qualifications, you can participate to the matriculation examination based on your degree.
content.matriculationEligibilityGuides2: Before registration, you must have completed following:
content.matriculationEligibilityGuides3: In addition for every subject you wish to participate in the matriculation examination, you must have completed specific amount of studies. If you have not completed enough studies, you can participate exams that are arranged later or you can discuss your situation with the counselor.
content.matriculationEligibilityGuides4: To participate in exam in the subjects you wish to, you must complete all mandatory studies. In cases where subject doesn't include mandatory studies, academic studies requires four credits and foreign languages requires six credits.

content.alwaysUp: Studying in Online Comprehensive School and Online Upper Secondary School don't depend on a time or a place. People can study with the help of Muikkuverkko 24/7 anywhere in Finland as well as abroad.
content.aineopiskelu: Single Adult Upper Secondary School Courses and Adult Secondary School Courses

content.immigrantEducation: Programmes for students with immigrant backgrounds offer comprehensive education for adults. In our campus, the region of Savo joins hands with the whole world.

content.noUserByEmail: Muikku has no user account corresponding to email address {{email}.
content.coursesAvailable: Explore the self-study online courses offered by Nettilukio and Nettiperuskoulu and other open materials.
content.organization: Otavia is a municipal enterprise owned by the city of Mikkeli that specializes in digital education through Online Upper Secondary School for Adults and Online Comprehensive School for Adults. We also welcome students to enroll in on-campus courses as part of different study programmes for students with immigrant backgrounds. It is also possible to enroll in a number of liberal adult education courses. We provide and develop education locally, nationwide and globally. Exploring, trying out and testing new approaches is at the heart of what we do at Otavia.

content.empty_student: There are no tasks given for you and you have not created any. You can create new tasks in the studies view.
content.instructions:
Plus icon will open an editor, which you can use to create a new task. If you wish, you can schedule a task to begin and end on a certain day. You can also set only one date or no date at all. The set dates will not affect the task visibility.

The task you wrote can only be seen by yourself. Your counselor can also assign tasks to you and then oversee them until they are done. When you have finished the task, you can assign it done. Tasks given by a counselor can be send for approval. When the counselor sets the task done, the state will change to "Done". Tasks will not be archived automatically, but you need to do it yourself by clicking the trash can icon.

instructions.connectField: Combine matching pairs by first selecting the text in the left-hand column and then selecting the text in the right-hand column.
instructions.journalMemoField: Make a journal entry in this text box. The entry will be automatically saved in your journal. Once the entry is finished, click the "Publish journal entry" button. You can edit the entry by clicking "Edit journal entry" and then re-publishing it.
instructions.mathField: Write mathematical equations by selecting characters from the menu or by using LaTeX. Don't use copy and paste, because copied characters may not work properly.
instructions.organizationField: First, select the text you want to move. Then, select the box where you want to move the text into. If you are doing the exercise on a computer, you can also click and drag texts.
instructions.sorterField: In order to arrange texts, you may click on two items to swap their places. If you are doing the exercise on a computer, you can also click and drag texts.

content.selectTemplate: Select a template from which to create the course from.
content.signUpInformation:
After clicking the "Sign up" button, you will be directed to the front page of the course. You can start studying immediately.

You can find the teacher's information on the front page of the course. If you have any questions or concerns regarding the course, you can send a message to the teacher via Muikku.

content.workspaceSignupMessageInfo: Activate the course-specific enrollment message. Activation is possible only when the message has a subject and content. content.workspaceSignupGroupMessageInfo: Activate the group-specific enrollment message. Activation is possible only when the message has a subject and content. This message will be sent only to members of this group who enroll in the course.

content.approving: Olen lukenut suunnitelman ja hyväksyn sen sisällön.
content.notActivated: Pedagogisen tuen suunnitelmaa ei ole aktivoitu.
content.notActivated_student: Pedagogisen tuen suunnitelmaa ei ole aktivoitu, ole yhteydessä erityisopettajaasi.
content.planAcceptance: Olen lukenut suunnitelman ja hyväksyn sen sisällön.
content.planApproval: Lue pedagogisen tuen suunnitelma ja merkitse se hyväksytyksi. Jos et hyväksy suunnitelmaa, ota yhteyttä erityisopettajaan.
content.planEditingActive: Sinulla on muokkaus aktiivisena. Tallenna tai peruuta muokkaus, jonka jälkeen voit lähettää suunnitelman opiskelijalle.
content.planSendInformation: Pedagogisen tuen suunnitelma laaditaan yhteistyössä opiskelijan kanssa. Suunnitelma jaetaan opiskelijalle Lähetä-painikkeen avulla. Opiskelija voi joko hyväksyä suunnitelman tai ottaa yhteyttä erityisopettajaan. Hyväksytyn suunnitelman näkevät erityisopettajan ja rehtorin lisäksi opiskelijaa opettava ja ohjaava henkilökunta. Alaikäisten opiskelijoiden kohdalla suunnitelman tietoja voidaan myös jakaa heidän huoltajilleen.
content.planVisibility: Erityisopettaja, rehtori sekä sinua opettavat ja ohjaavat henkilöt saavat nähdä pedagogisen tuen suunnitelmasi. Jos olet alaikäinen, myös huoltajallasi on oikeus nähdä suunnitelman tietoja.
content.pointOfViewNotSet: Lukion näkemystä ei ole vielä asetettu
content.unsavedWarning: Sinulla on tallentamattomia muutoksia. Haluatko varmasti peruuttaa muokkauksen?
